page.title: 04ORGANISATIONS IN SHREWTON
page.content: Shrewton has many organisations. For children there are: Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts, and Sunday Schools at St. Mary's and the Methodist Churches. Also the Spearhead and Village Youth Clubs. Play school and Activity Play Group caters for the under 5 year olds and Toddlers for the very young. The junior Drama Club takes part in the village pantomime each year. The ladies can choose from: Women's Institute, Mothers Union and Group 81. The men have choice of: The village football or cricket clubs. The joint clubs are: Folk, Old Time and Modern Dancing, Drama, Till Valley Horticultural Society, Till Valley Day Care Centre, Shrewton Silver Band, The Over 60's, Shrewton Council of Churches, and various clubs connected with the five village public houses. We live in a busy village!
